cleaned_text: 8 Oz. Aromatherapy Air Freshener is made in the USA and scented with pure essential oils blend. No additional chemical or non-toxic are added so they provide a wonderful natural refreshing scent. Safe & Eco-Friendly. Ingredients: Pure essential oils blend Non-GMO pure therapeutic grade, Fragrance Oils, Organic Dried Lavender Flowers, Water Crystals, Distilled water. Lavender Aromatherapy air freshener. Ball Mason 8 ounce (225g) jar. Made in the USA. When placed in a car, the 4 ounce Air Freshener lasts about 30-45 days, and the 8 ounce Air Freshener lasts about 60 days. - To enable the lasting smell of the air-freshener, please gently shake the jar.
